languages.text: {n}Как бы безвредно и даже убого не выглядел старик, вас таким не проймешь. Наученн{mf|ый|ая} в первую очередь искать {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}преступный умысел{/d}, вы задерживаетесь взглядом на ящиках — уж больно они похожи на армированные контейнеры для перевозки оружия.{/n}

{n}No matter how innocuous or wretched the old man's appearance, it will take more than that to deceive you. Trained always to look for {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}criminal intent{/d} first and foremost, you cast a suspicious eye at the crates — these look too much like reinforced containers used for transporting weapons.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Как бы безвредно и даже убого не выглядел старик, вас таким не проймешь. Наученн{mf|ый|ая} в первую очередь искать {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}преступный умысел{/d}, вы задерживаетесь взглядом на ящиках — уж больно они похожи на армированные контейнеры для перевозки оружия.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Même si cet homme vous semble aussi inoffensif que misérable, il en faudra plus pour vous duper. Votre formation vous a avant tout enseigné à déceler les {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}intentions criminelles{/d}, et vous observez attentivement ces caisses étrangement similaires aux conteneurs renforcés utilisés pour le transport d'armes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}No matter how innocuous or wretched the old man's appearance, it will take more than that to deceive you. Trained always to look for {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}criminal intent{/d} first and foremost, you cast a suspicious eye at the crates — these look too much like reinforced containers used for transporting weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Même si cet homme vous semble aussi inoffensif que misérable, il en faudra plus pour vous duper. Votre formation vous a avant tout enseigné à déceler les {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}intentions criminelles{/d}, et vous observez attentivement ces caisses étrangement similaires aux conteneurs renforcés utilisés pour le transport d'armes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}その老人の見た目がどれほど無害そうで哀れであろうとも、あなたを欺くには到底足りない。まず何よりも{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}犯罪の意図{/d}を見抜くように常に訓練されてきたあなたは、木箱に疑いの目を向けた。それはあまりにも武器輸送用の強化コンテナに似すぎていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}No matter how innocuous or wretched the old man's appearance, it will take more than that to deceive you. Trained always to look for {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}criminal intent{/d} first and foremost, you cast a suspicious eye at the crates — these look too much like reinforced containers used for transporting weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その老人の見た目がどれほど無害そうで哀れであろうとも、あなたを欺くには到底足りない。まず何よりも{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}犯罪の意図{/d}を見抜くように常に訓練されてきたあなたは、木箱に疑いの目を向けた。それはあまりにも武器輸送用の強化コンテナに似すぎていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yaşlı adam her ne kadar zararsız veya sefil görünse de bu hâliyle seni kandıramıyor. Her daim her şeyde {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}art niyet{/d} aramak üzere eğitildiğinden kasalara şüpheyle bakıyorsun. Bunlar, silah taşımak üzere güçlendirilmiş konteynerlere benziyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}No matter how innocuous or wretched the old man's appearance, it will take more than that to deceive you. Trained always to look for {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}criminal intent{/d} first and foremost, you cast a suspicious eye at the crates — these look too much like reinforced containers used for transporting weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yaşlı adam her ne kadar zararsız veya sefil görünse de bu hâliyle seni kandıramıyor. Her daim her şeyde {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}art niyet{/d} aramak üzere eğitildiğinden kasalara şüpheyle bakıyorsun. Bunlar, silah taşımak üzere güçlendirilmiş konteynerlere benziyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Da igual lo inocuo o retorcido que sea el aspecto del anciano, no basta para engañarte. Has entrenado mucho para detectar las {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}intenciones criminales{/d}, y tus ojos se dirigen casi por su cuenta a las cajas. Se parecen demasiado a los contenedores reforzados que se usan para transportar armas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}No matter how innocuous or wretched the old man's appearance, it will take more than that to deceive you. Trained always to look for {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}criminal intent{/d} first and foremost, you cast a suspicious eye at the crates — these look too much like reinforced containers used for transporting weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Da igual lo inocuo o retorcido que sea el aspecto del anciano, no basta para engañarte. Has entrenado mucho para detectar las {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}intenciones criminales{/d}, y tus ojos se dirigen casi por su cuenta a las cajas. Se parecen demasiado a los contenedores reforzados que se usan para transportar armas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}即便这个老人看起来再怎么孤苦伶仃、人畜无害，想骗过你也没那么容易。你接受过专业训练，可以一眼看穿人们的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}犯罪企图{/d}。你以怀疑的目光盯着他身边的箱子——它们看起来很像是专门运输武器的加固箱子。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}No matter how innocuous or wretched the old man's appearance, it will take more than that to deceive you. Trained always to look for {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}criminal intent{/d} first and foremost, you cast a suspicious eye at the crates — these look too much like reinforced containers used for transporting weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}即便这个老人看起来再怎么孤苦伶仃、人畜无害，想骗过你也没那么容易。你接受过专业训练，可以一眼看穿人们的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}犯罪企图{/d}。你以怀疑的目光盯着他身边的箱子——它们看起来很像是专门运输武器的加固箱子。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Egal, wie harmlos oder erbärmlich der alte Mann auch aussehen mag ... so leicht lässt du dich nicht täuschen. Da du darauf trainiert bist, stets eine {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}kriminelle Absicht{/d} zu vermuten, wirfst du einen misstrauischen Blick auf die Kisten ... die dich stark an verstärkte Container für den Transport von Waffen erinnern.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}No matter how innocuous or wretched the old man's appearance, it will take more than that to deceive you. Trained always to look for {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}criminal intent{/d} first and foremost, you cast a suspicious eye at the crates — these look too much like reinforced containers used for transporting weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Egal, wie harmlos oder erbärmlich der alte Mann auch aussehen mag ... so leicht lässt du dich nicht täuschen. Da du darauf trainiert bist, stets eine {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}kriminelle Absicht{/d} zu vermuten, wirfst du einen misstrauischen Blick auf die Kisten ... die dich stark an verstärkte Container für den Transport von Waffen erinnern.{/n}
